import sys
sys.path.insert\(0, ''D:/work/polymarket''\)

# å¯¼å…¥å¿…è¦çš„æ¨¡å—
from pathlib import Path
import json

# è¯»å–tag_categories
tag_categories_file = Path\(''D:/work/polymarket/data''\) / ''tag_categories.json''
with open\(tag_categories_file, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f:
    data = json.load\(f\)
    tag_categories = data.get\(''categories'', {}\)

domain = ''crypto''
valid_subcats = set\(tag_categories.get\(domain, []\)\)

# æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå­ç±»åˆ«å¤„ç†
raw_subcats = [''btc'']
from local_scanner_v2 import SUBCATEGORY_ALIASES
expanded = []
for s in raw_subcats:
    mapped = SUBCATEGORY_ALIASES.get\(s.lower\(\), s\)
    expanded.append\(mapped\)

invalid = [s for s in expanded if s not in valid_subcats]
print\(f''expanded: {expanded}''\)
print\(f''valid_subcats sample: {list\(valid_subcats\)[:5]}''\)
print\(f''invalid: {invalid}''\)

# bitcoinåº”è¯¥åœ¨valid_subcatsä¸­
print\(f''bitcoin in valid_subcats: {""bitcoin"" in valid_subcats}''\)
print\(f''bitcoin-prices in valid_subcats: {""bitcoin-prices"" in valid_subcats}''\)
")

Bash("D:\\work\\polymarket\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
import json

# æµ‹è¯•APIè¿”å›çš„eventsä¸­æ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«markets
url = ''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/events''
params = {''tag_id'': ''102321'', ''active'': ''true'', ''limit'': 1}

response = requests.get\(url, params=params, timeout=10\)
response.raise_for_status\(\)
events = response.json\(\)

if events:
    event = events[0]
    print\(f''Event ID: {event.get\(""id""\)}''\)
    print\(f''Event title: {event.get\(""title""\)}''\)
    print\(f''Has markets key: {""markets"" in event}''\)
    if ''markets'' in event:
        markets = event.get\(''markets'', []\)
        print\(f''Number of markets: {len\(markets\)}''\)
        if markets:
            print\(f''First market keys: {list\(markets[0].keys\(\)\)[:10]}''\)
    else:
        print\(''Available keys:'', list\(event.keys\(\)\)[:20]\)
else:
    print\(''No events returned''\)
")

Bash("D:\\work\\polymarket\\.venv\\Scripts\\python.exe" -c "
import requests
import json

# æµ‹è¯•å¤šä¸ªeventsï¼Œçœ‹çœ‹marketsæƒ…å†µ
url = ''https://gamma-api.polymarket.com/events''
params = {''tag_id'': ''102321'', ''active'': ''true'', ''limit'': 10}

response = requests.get\(url, params=params, timeout=10\)
response.raise_for_status\(\)
events = response.json\(\)

print\(f''Total events: {len\(events\)}''\)

total_markets = 0
for event in events:
    markets = event.get\(''markets'', []\)
    total_markets += len\(markets\)
    
print\(f''Total markets across all events: {total_markets}''\)

# æ£€æŸ¥ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªmarketçš„è¯¦ç»†ä¿¡æ¯
if events and events[0].get\(''markets''\):
    m = events[0][''markets''][0]
    print\(f''\\nFirst market sample:''\)
    print\(f''  question: {m.get\(""question""\)[:50]}...''\)
    print\(f''  outcomePrices: {m.get\(""outcomePrices""\)}''\)
    print\(f''  liquidity: {m.get\(""liquidity""\)}''\)
")
